meanings.definition: A short, sharp sound made by a computer mouse or keyboard when a button is pressed.
meanings.sent1: I heard a click when I pressed the mouse button.
meanings.sent2: The click of the keyboard keys filled the quiet room.
meanings.sent3: The click of the mouse sounded like a tiny drumbeat.
meanings.sent4: The click of the keyboard was like raindrops on a tin roof.
meanings.sent5: The click of the mouse was as loud as a tiny bell ringing.

meanings.definition: To make a short, sharp sound.
meanings.sent1: I like to click my pen when I'm thinking.
meanings.sent2: The door handle clicked shut behind me.
meanings.sent3: The old clock clicked away the seconds in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her heels clicked on the pavement as she walked away.
meanings.sent5: The gears clicked into place with a satisfying sound.

meanings.definition: To select an item on a computer screen by pressing a button on a mouse.
meanings.sent1: I click on the icon to open the program.
meanings.sent2: She clicked on the link to visit the website.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to click on the moving cursor on the screen.
meanings.sent4: With a click, the file was successfully saved.
meanings.sent5: He clicked on the image to zoom in for a closer look.
